about_the_game:
Reach for the sky with the1st DLC for Moto Racer 4: Sliced Peak

Travel along snow-covered, winding mountain roads and show your skill at handling extreme conditions on the two new circuits included in this pack:

Asphalt - Drifting Away: Skim across the slippery mountain roads, being careful not to plunge over the precipices ahead to a fiery demise.

Dirt - Ice Edge: Ride through this mystical track built around a Dragon cut out of the heart of the mountain.
